Sentencas: A novel fuel, methylcellulose (MC) was used in the combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (SDC) powders for the first time.
Titulo: A facile combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 powders by in situ assembly of polymer

Sentencas: The formation of SDC powders with small crystal size could be attributed to the special performance of MC, which made mixed nitrate entrapped within the cage formed by the cross-linking of MC chains.
Titulo: A facile combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 powders by in situ assembly of polymer

Sentencas: The precursor solution decomposed violently at about 150 degrees C confirmed by TG - DTA test.
Titulo: A facile combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 powders by in situ assembly of polymer

Sentencas: The influence of fuel contents on the powder's properties was investigated by XRD measurements.
Titulo: A facile combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 powders by in situ assembly of polymer

Sentencas: The experimental cell parameters calculation showed that stoichiometric SDC powders could be obtained only when stoichiometric or fuel-rich MC was used.
Titulo: A facile combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 powders by in situ assembly of polymer

Sentencas: High sintering activity was favorable for compacted bodies achieving almost near theoretical density.
Titulo: A facile combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 powders by in situ assembly of polymer

Sentencas: By this combustion synthesis method, SDC powders with high conductivity, which was 0.00765 S cm (- 1) at 600 degrees C, was obtained and suitable for the solid oxide fuel cell's applications.
Titulo: A facile combustion synthesis of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 powders by in situ assembly of polymer
